import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { auth, firestore } from "../../services/firebase"; import firebase from "firebase/app"; import { Route, BrowserRouter as Router, Switch } from "react-router-dom"; function Category() { return ( ); } function Index() { const [category, setCategory] = useState([]); const [dropdown, setDropdown] = useState(false); const [create, setCreate] = useState(false); const [update, setUpdate] = useState(false); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [name, setName] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { firestore.collection('category').orderBy('datetime', 'desc').onSnapshot(snapshot => { setCategory(snapshot.docs.map(doc => { return { id: doc.id, name: doc.data().name, datetime: doc.data().datetime } })); }); }, []); const onSubmit = async () => { firestore.collection('category').add({ name: name, datetime: firebase.firestore.FieldValue.serverTimestamp() }).then((result) => { setName(""); setCreate(false); }).catch((error) => { console.error(error); }); } return (
